TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the event of the and classes.
Gets the results of emulated recognition.
Docs.value: Detailed information about the results of recognition, or if an error occurred.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> and contains full information about a phrase returned by a recognition operation. You can obtain a list off all the recognition candidates from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property.
If recognizer encounters an exception during the recognition operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property is set to `null`.
